source: # Install requirements with 'pip install -r requirements.txt' (python 2) or 'pip3 install -r requirements.txt' (python 3)

alloy = 'AFLOW_ALLOY_INSERT_HERE'
# NOTE: If your aflow is not installed in your path, then replace aflow_executable below with the path
plotter = Plotter(aflow_executable = 'aflow')
plotter.plot(alloy)
# NOTE: For 2D plot double click to the right of point to go to compound link
# For ternary plot double click on point and then click on the pop-up banner to go to compound link
# Be patient when you see the * to the left
